name: Delicious DVD
description:
Toni makes pasta new again. In one episode, she puts an Italian spin on the one-dish meal and creates a “meaty” Roasted Eggplant Cannelloni, another classic dinner with a delicious twist, then finishes off the meal with her very special Tofu Cannoli*. In the other episode, Toni puts a new twist on a worldwide favorite, to create a Vegetarian Beefy Lasagna that’s out of this world. Then she pairs it with Insalata Pomodoro (tomato salad) and a light, authentic Italian-style Garlic Bread.

*Cannoli shells may contain dairy, so check the label if you’re vegan.
All other recipes have vegan or vegetarian substitutes.
